About the Company: Brawn Biotech Ltd is involved in the manufacture of tablets, capsules, and oral syrups,contract manufacture, and supply of pharmaceutical products. The company`s products are made under various categories namely Analgesics, Antibiotics, Anti Tuberculosis, Anti-inflammatory, Antipyretic, Anti Malarial, B Complex and Amino Acids, Cardiovascular drugs, Antiphyscotropic drugs, Tranquilizers and Antacids.
